{"id":535635699,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1628493390,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/535635699/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string addStrings(string num1, string num2) {\n        int sz1 = num1.size();\n        int sz2 = num2.size();\n        \n        if(sz1 < sz2) {\n            swap(num1, num2);\n            swap(sz1, sz2);\n        }\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < sz2; ++i) {\n            num1[sz1 - 1 - i] += num2[sz2 - 1 - i] - '0';\n        }\n        \n        for(int i = sz1 - 1; i > 0; --i) {\n            int num = (num1[i] - '0');\n            if(num > 9) {\n                num1[i - 1] += 1;\n                num1[i] -= 10;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if(num1[0] > '9') {\n            string output = \"1\";\n            output.append(num1);\n            output[1] -= 10;\n            \n            return output;\n        }\n        \n        return num1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
